sentence.Network_en: Each family farms individually and reaps the benefit of its labor.
sentence.Network_cn: 各家经营各自的农场，收获各自的劳动成果。

sentence.Network_en: Ted hated parties, even gatherings of people he liked individually.
sentence.Network_cn: 特德讨厌各种派对，即便是他自己喜欢的人的聚会也不例外。

sentence.Network_en: There are 76 individually furnished bedrooms, all with private bathrooms.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里有76间陈设各异的卧室，都配有独立卫生间。

entry.def: Individual means relating to one person or thing, rather than to a large group.

example.ex: They wait for the group to decide rather than making individual decisions...
example.tran: 他们等待团体作决定而不是各自作出决定。

example.ex: Aid to individual countries would be linked to progress towards democracy...
example.tran: 对个别国家的援助会与其民主进程相挂钩。

example.ex: ...anonymous individuals who are doing good things within our community.
example.tran: 一些在我们社区内做好事却不留名的个人

example.ex: ...the rights and responsibilities of the individual...

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as individual, you mean that you admire them because they are very unusual and do not try to imitate other people or things.

example.ex: It was really all part of her very individual personality...
example.tran: 那其实都是她独特个性的表现。

sentences.sentence: "taken individually, the rooms were, in fact, square"

Sentence.sentence: It can include them in subscription deals sold to libraries or sell them individually under a consumer licence.

sentences.en: Each apple was individually wrapped in paper.
sentences.cn: 每个苹果都用纸单独包着 。

sentences.en: Each of the ten bedrooms is individually furnished.
sentences.cn: 十个臥室都配有各自的家具。

sentences.en: Every part is individually checked before assembly.
sentences.cn: 在装配前,部件要逐个检查。
